ARABIC: وَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنْيَا وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَبْعُوثِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They say, 'There is nothing but this life and we will not be raised again.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They say: "There is no other life but that of this world, and we will not be raised (from the dead)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They say now: 'There is nothing but the life of this world, and we shall not be raised from the dead.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They have said that this life is the only life and that there will be no Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they said, “There is no other life except our life of this world, and we are not to be raised.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they said: "There is no (other life) but our (present) life of this world, and never shall we be resurrected."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they say: There is nothing but our life of this world, and we shall not be raised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And they say, 'There is only our present life; we shall not be raised.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they say: There is naught save our life of the world, and we shall not be raised (again).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They say, "There is nothing beyond our life in this world: we shall not be raised up again from the dead."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they say: there is naught but our life of the world, nor are we to be raised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They say, ‘There is nothing but our life of this world, and we shall not be resurrected.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And they (sometimes) say: "There is nothing except our life on this earth, and never shall we be raised up again."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they said: "There is no (other life) but our (present) life of this world, and never shall we be resurrected (on the Day of Resurrection)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They say: 'There is only but our present life; we shall not be resurrected'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they say, “There is nothing but our life in this world, and we will not be resurrected.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they say, "There is none but our worldly life, and we will not be resurrected."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [6:29] And they, those who deny the Resurrection, say, ‘There is no other, life, than our present life; we shall not be resurrected’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they say) i.e. the disbelievers of Mecca: (There is naught save our life of the world, and we shall not be raised (again)) after we die.
